sentences.en: After a shower like this, the grassland becomes even greener and has a fresher scent.
sentences.cn: 象缀满草尖上的水珠,却又象数不清的金刚钻.

sentences.en: Animal husbandry on the grassland is developing rapidly.
sentences.cn: 草原上的畜牧业在迅速发展.

sentences.en: In August 1935 , we began our march across the marshy grassland.
In these conservation - conscious times, areas of grassland are no longer expendable.
sentences.cn: 在人们意识到应当保护自然资源的这个时代, 草原已不容再受破坏了.

sentences.en: Many other papers discussed the place of fertilizers in grassland farming.
sentences.cn: 许多其它的报告,曾讨论过施肥在牧草栽培制中的地位.

sentences.en: The grassland smelt fresh and sweet after rain.
The grassland soils are generally the most productive.
sentences.cn: 草原土壤通常都是最肥沃的.

sentences.en: The grassland stretches evenly before you, like a becalmed sea.
sentences.cn: 无边的草原是这样平展, 就象风平浪静的海洋.

sentences.en: The snowstorm swept the vast expanse of grassland.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪袭击了辽阔的草原.

sentences.en: There are several mountain ranges with interspersed areas of grassland and desert.
sentences.cn: 这儿有几个山区,其间散布着多块草原和沙漠.

sentences.en: There is a level and smooth grassland in front of that room.
sentences.cn: 在那屋子的前面有一块平整的草地.

sentences.en: There is a reach of grassland in the distance.
sentences.cn: 远处是连绵一片的草原.

sentences.en: There is good grassland here for your cattle and horses to graze on.
sentences.cn: 这里有很好的草地供你们放牧牛马.

sentences.en: Walking through that wet grassland, our boots were caked with mud.
sentences.cn: 穿过了那片湿草地, 我们的靴子粘满了烂泥.

trans.tran_en: a large area of land covered with wild grass
